mapper.select: select e.dept_id, e.emp_nm, e.emp_id, e.sex_id, s.sex_nm, p.pos_nm, e.tel_no, e.e_mail, e.join_dt, e.pos_id from EMP e, POS p, SEX s where e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.sex_id = s.sex_id and e.dept_id = 'MM'
select e.emp_id as emp_id from EMP e, POS p, SEX s where e.pos_id = p.pos_id and e.sex_id = s.sex_id and e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
